info.title: Trello API
info.description: This Swagger specification documents the Trello API, which provides a set of endpoints for interacting with Trello boards, cards, and other resources.

get.description: Fetches all boards in my account

parameters.name: boards
parameters.description: List all boards

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Trello board.

delete.summary: Delete a Trello board by ID
delete.description: Delete a Trello board by ID

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board to delete.

get.description: Retrieve a Trello board by its ID.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board.

put.summary: Update a Trello board by ID
put.description: This endpoint allows you to update a Trello board by its ID.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the board (1 to 16384 characters long).

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: A new description for the board (0 to 16384 characters long).

parameters.name: closed
parameters.description: Whether the board is closed.

parameters.name: subscribed
parameters.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board.

parameters.name: idOrganization
parameters.description: The ID of the Workspace the board should be moved to.

parameters.name: prefs/permissionLevel
parameters.description: The permission level for the board (one of org, private, public).

parameters.name: prefs/selfJoin
parameters.description: Whether Workspace members can join the board themselves.

parameters.name: prefs/cardCovers
parameters.description: Whether card covers should be displayed on this board.

parameters.name: prefs/hideVotes
parameters.description: Determines whether the Voting Power-Up should hide who voted on cards or not.

parameters.name: prefs/invitations
parameters.description: Who can invite people to this board (one of admins, members).

get.summary: Get actions of a Trello board
get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve actions for a Trello board by its ID.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board for which you want to retrieve actions.

get.summary: Get cards on a Trello board
get.description: Retrieve cards on a Trello board by board id.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board for which you want to retrieve cards.

get.summary: Get filtered cards on a Trello board
get.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve filtered cards on a Trello board by its ID and a filter value.

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board for which you want to retrieve filtered cards.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply when retrieving cards (all, closed, none, open, visible).

put.summary: Update a card by card id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello card to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the card

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: The new description of the card.

parameters.name: idList
parameters.description: The ID of the list where the card should be created (REQUIRED).

parameters.name: idBoard
parameters.description: The ID of the board the card should be on.

delete.summary: Delete a Trello card by ID
delete.description: This endpoint allows you to delete a Trello card by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello card to delete.

post.summary: Create a list on a Trello board
post.description: This endpoint allows you to create a list on a Trello board by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board where you want to create the list.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the list you want to create.

post.summary: Create a new card on a Trello board
post.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new card on a Trello board.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for the card.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: The description for the card.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The position of the new card (top, bottom, or a positive float).

parameters.name: due
parameters.description: A due date for the card (Format date).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date of a card or null (Format date).

parameters.name: dueComplete
parameters.description: Whether the due date is complete (boolean).

parameters.name: idList
parameters.description: The ID of the list where the card should be created (REQUIRED).

parameters.name: idMembers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to add to the card.

parameters.name: idLabels
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to add to the card.

parameters.name: urlSource
parameters.description: A URL starting with http:// or https://.
